synopsis.text: Hidamari Sketch fans, rejoice! Your favorite characters Hiro, Miyako, Sae, and Yuno are set to return in Hidamari Sketch x 365, as announced at the 2007 'Chou Hidamatsuri in Nippon Budokan' event. This mini-episode/promo serves as a thrilling prelude to the upcoming season, promising more heartwarming moments and laughter with the lovable quartet. Get ready to dive back into their captivating world and embark on a new season filled with excitement and joy!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
